column2: Administrative Measures Adopted by the Government and the Monetary Board during the Year

column1: Payment	and	Settlement	Systems	Circular	No.	09/2021
To: All participants of LankaSettle System

column2: SUBJECT: NEW VERSION OF THE LANKASETTLE SYSTEM RULES - VERSION 2.2
A new version of the LankaSettle System Rules has been published by the Gazette Notification No. 2213/2 dated 01st February
